I am an associate professor (tenure track) at [Kobe University](https://www.econ.kobe-u.ac.jp/en/).

My research field is family economics, broadly speaking, I am interested in questions like:

- Why do gender wage and earning gaps still remain?
- Why does the fertility rate remain low in any country?
